ContentDescription_V1: Explore ideas, experiences, observations and imagination to create visual artworks
Comment: New content description written combining content descriptions from the Explore and Express strand and Respond and Interpret strand in VC1 to align with the change in structure of the Exploring strand in VC2. Focus on local communities

ContentDescription_V1: Respond to visual artworks and consider where and why people make visual artworks
Comment: New content description written combining content descriptions from the Explore and Express strand and Respond and Interpret strand in VC1 to align with the change in structure of the Exploring strand in VC2. Focus on local communities

ContentDescription_V1: Explore ideas, experiences, observations and imagination to create visual artworks
Comment: New content description written combining content descriptions from the Explore and Express strand and Respond and Interpret strand in VC1 to align with the change in structure of the Exploring strand in VC2. Content description more focused on exploring ideas in artworks with a focus on play

ContentDescription_V1: Respond to visual artworks and consider where and why people make visual artworks
Comment: New content description written combining content descriptions from the Explore and Express strand and Respond and Interpret strand in VC1 to align with the change in structure of the Exploring strand in VC2. Content description more focused on exploring ideas in artworks with a focus on play

ContentDescription_V1: Experiment with different materials and techniques to make artworks
Comment: Change and addition of terminology to demonstrate the breadth of visual arts practices. Focus on play

ContentDescription_V1: Experiment with different materials and techniques to make artworks
Comment: Content description changed to align with the change in structure of the Creating strand. Deepened learning by creating artworks to communicate ideas and explore meaning

ContentDescription_V1: Create and display artworks
Comment: Content description changed to align with the change in structure of the Creating strand. Deepened learning by creating artworks to communicate ideas and explore meaning

ContentDescription_V1: Create and display artworks
Comment: Specific references to ‘viewers’ and ‘audiences’ have been added to develop student understanding of the relationship between an artwork and the viewer/audience. ‘Viewer’ and ‘audience’ have been added as ‘viewer’ or ‘audience’ definitions are dependent on the art form

ContentDescription_V1: Explore ideas, experiences, observations and imagination and express them through subject matter in visual artworks they create
Comment: Two content descriptions have been combined into one to merge the Explore and Express Ideas, and Respond and Interpret strands in VC1. Change in focus to combine the key concepts of making and responding across all strands in VC2

ContentDescription_V1: Respond to visual artworks, including artworks by local Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander peoples, by describing subject matter and ideas
Comment: Two content descriptions have been combined into one to merge the Explore and Express Ideas, and Respond and Interpret strands in VC1. Change in focus to combine the key concepts of making and responding across all strands in VC2

ContentDescription_V1: Experiment with different materials, techniques and processes to make artworks in a range of art forms
Comment: Broadened the content description, focused on ‘exploration’ to align with the Developing Practices strand definition

ContentDescription_V1: Experiment with different materials, techniques and processes to make artworks in a range of art forms
Comment: The content descriptions from the Visual Arts Practices strand and Present and Perform strand in VC1 have been combined to reflect the concepts in the Creating strand in VC2

ContentDescription_V1: Create and display artworks to express ideas to an audience
Comment: The content descriptions from the Visual Arts Practices strand and Present and Perform strand in VC1 have been combined to reflect the concepts in the Creating strand in VC2

ContentDescription_V1: Create and display artworks to express ideas to an audience
Comment: Change in strand to focus on the presentation of artworks. ‘Creating’ now has its own strand to focus on key concepts linked to the strand definition

ContentDescription_V1: Explore ideas and artworks from different cultures and times as inspiration to create visual artworks
Comment: Two content descriptions from the Explore and Express Ideas strand and Respond and Interpret strand in VC1 have been combined to align with the change in the structure of the strands in VC2

ContentDescription_V1: Identify and discuss how ideas are expressed in artworks from a range of places, times and cultures, including artworks by Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander peoples
Comment: Two content descriptions from the Explore and Express Ideas strand and Respond and Interpret strand in VC1 have been combined to align with the change in the structure of the strands in VC2

ContentDescription_V1: Identify and discuss how ideas are expressed in artworks from a range of places, times and cultures, including artworks by Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander peoples
Comment: The content description has been moved from the Respond and Interpret strand in VC1 to the Exploring strand in VC2, aligning with the change in structure of the curriculum. Exploring and Responding are combined in Visual Arts learning. Provides a focus on visual artworks and practices by Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Peoples. Artworks are no longer viewed as static artefacts. Embraces contemporary works and practices of Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Peoples

ContentDescription_V1: Explore visual conventions and use materials, techniques, technologies and processes specific to particular art forms, and to make artworks
Comment: Change in terminology to focus on Developing Practices in VC2. Students explore and experiment with key concepts of visual arts practice to create artworks

ContentDescription_V1: Explore visual conventions and use materials, techniques, technologies and processes specific to particular art forms, and to make artworks
Comment: A new content description has been written to align with the change in structure of the strand. Students learn about the concepts of Visual Arts to communicate ideas and create meaning

ContentDescription_V1: Explore different ways of displaying artworks to enhance their meaning for an audience
Comment: A new content description has been written to align with the change in structure of the strand. Students learn about the concepts of Visual Arts to communicate ideas and create meaning

ContentDescription_V1: Explore different ways of displaying artworks to enhance their meaning for an audience
Comment: Change in terminology with a focus on the display or presentation of artworks

ContentDescription_V1: Explore visual arts practices as inspiration to create artworks that express different ideas and beliefs
Comment: Content descriptions from the Explore and Express Ideas strand and Respond and Interpret strand in the VC1 have been combined. Change to a focus on visual arts practices to align with the change in the definition of the Exploring strand in VC2. References to practices of Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Peoples added for inclusivity

ContentDescription_V1: Identify and describe how ideas are expressed in artworks by comparing artworks from different contemporary, historical and cultural contexts, including artworks by Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander peoples
Comment: Content descriptions from the Explore and Express Ideas strand and Respond and Interpret strand in the VC1 have been combined. Change to a focus on visual arts practices to align with the change in the definition of the Exploring strand in VC2. References to practices of Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Peoples added for inclusivity

ContentDescription_V1: Explore visual arts practices as inspiration to create artworks that express different ideas and beliefs
Comment: References to the content descriptions from the Explore and Express Ideas strand and Respond and Interpret strand have been combined with a focus on practices and artworks by Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Peoples

ContentDescription_V1: Identify and describe how ideas are expressed in artworks by comparing artworks from different contemporary, historical and cultural contexts, including artworks by Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander peoples
Comment: References to the content descriptions from the Explore and Express Ideas strand and Respond and Interpret strand have been combined with a focus on practices and artworks by Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Peoples

ContentDescription_V1: Select and apply visual conventions, materials, techniques, technologies and processes specific to different art forms when making artworks
Comment: Change to focus on the development of skills in visual arts practice

ContentDescription_V1: Select and apply visual conventions, materials, techniques, technologies and processes specific to different art forms when making artworks
Comment: Change to focus on the planning and making of artworks, with an understanding of how to convey meaning

ContentDescription_V1: Create and display artwork considering how ideas can be expressed to an audience
Comment: The presentation of practice, including documentation, is now included in the content description

ContentDescription_V1: Analyse how ideas and viewpoints are expressed in artworks and how they are viewed by audiences
Comment: Content descriptions from the Explore and Express Ideas strand and Respond and Interpret strand in VC1 have been combined to align with the Exploring strand in VC2. References to artworks by Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Peoples has been shifted into a single content description

ContentDescription_V1: Identify and connect specific features of visual artworks from different cultures, historical and contemporary times, including artworks by Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander peoples
Comment: Content descriptions from the Explore and Express Ideas strand and Respond and Interpret strand in VC1 have been combined to align with the Exploring strand in VC2. References to artworks by Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Peoples has been shifted into a single content description

ContentDescription_V1: Analyse how ideas and viewpoints are expressed in artworks and how they are viewed by audiences
Comment: Content description moved from Respond and Interpret strand in VC1 to the Exploring strand in VC2 to align with the change in strand definitions. Provides a focus on artworks by Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Peoples, including Indigenous Cultural and Intellectual Property rights

ContentDescription_V1: Identify and connect specific features of visual artworks from different cultures, historical and contemporary times, including artworks by Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander peoples
Comment: Content description moved from Respond and Interpret strand in VC1 to the Exploring strand in VC2 to align with the change in strand definitions. Provides a focus on artworks by Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Peoples, including Indigenous Cultural and Intellectual Property rights

ContentDescription_V1: Develop skills in planning and designing art works and documenting artistic practice
Comment: Changed to focus on the development and refinement of skills in visual arts practice

ContentDescription_V1: Experiment with materials, techniques, technologies and processes in a range of art forms to express ideas, concepts and themes in artworks
Comment: Changed content description to broaden the understanding of visual arts practice. Some content has been moved to the Creating strand

ContentDescription_V1: Experiment with materials, techniques, technologies and processes in a range of art forms to express ideas, concepts and themes in artworks
Comment: Change in terminology to align with the definition of the strand. Content descriptions have been split and reworded

ContentDescription_V1: Create and display artworks, describing how ideas are expressed to an audience
Comment: Present and Perform strand has been split between Creating and Presenting strands. Terminology in the content description refers to creating artworks using visual arts practice and an understanding of communicating ideas and meaning

ContentDescription_V1: Create and display artworks, describing how ideas are expressed to an audience
Comment: The content description has been broadened to include an understanding of how the presentation of artworks are curated to communicate ideas, perspectives and meaning. Aligns with VCE Visual Arts knowledge and skills

ContentDescription_V1: Explore how artists manipulate materials, techniques, technologies and processes to develop and express their intentions in art works
Comment: Content descriptions from the Explore and Express Ideas strand and Respond and Interpret strand in VC1 have been combined to align with the structure of the Exploring strand in VC2. The content description provides a link to the key knowledge and skills of VCE Visual Arts, Media and Visual Communication Design

ContentDescription_V1: Explore the visual arts practices and styles as inspiration to develop a personal style, explore, express ideas, concepts and themes in art works
Comment: Content descriptions from the Explore and Express Ideas strand and Respond and Interpret strand in VC1 have been combined to align with the structure of the Exploring strand in VC2. The content description provides a link to the key knowledge and skills of VCE Visual Arts, Media and Visual Communication Design

ContentDescription_V1: Analyse, interpret and evaluate a range of visual artworks from different cultures, historical and contemporary contexts, including artworks by Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Peoples to explore differing viewpoints
Comment: Content descriptions from the Explore and Express Ideas strand and Respond and Interpret strand in VC1 have been combined to align with the structure of the Exploring strand in VC2. The content description provides a link to the key knowledge and skills of VCE Visual Arts, Media and Visual Communication Design

ContentDescription_V1: Analyse, interpret and evaluate a range of visual artworks from different cultures, historical and contemporary contexts, including artworks by Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Peoples to explore differing viewpoints
Comment: Content description has moved from the Respond and Interpret strand in VC1 to the Exploring strand in VC2 to align with the structure of visual arts practice and to align with the structure of practice in VCE Visual Arts. Relationship with content, key knowledge and key skills in VCE Visual Arts, Media and Visual Communication Design

ContentDescription_V1: Select and manipulate materials, techniques, and technologies and processes in a range of art forms to express ideas, concepts and themes
Comment: Broadened content description to align with the structure and definition of visual arts practice. Links to VCE Visual Arts, Media and Visual Communication Design

ContentDescription_V1: Conceptualise, plan and design art works that express ideas, concepts and artistic intentions
Comment: Content description has been reworded to align with the structure and definition of visual arts practice. Links to VCE Visual Arts, Media and Visual Communication Design

ContentDescription_V1: Create, present, analyse and evaluate displays of artwork considering how ideas can be conveyed to an audience
Comment: The components of the content descriptions from the Present and Perform, Explore and Express Ideas, and Respond and Interpret strands in VC1 have been integrated into content descriptions in the Developing Practices, Creating and Exploring strands to align with the revised structure in VC2. Links to VCE Visual Arts, Media and Visual Communication Design study designs

ContentDescription_V1: Analyse and interpret artworks to explore the different forms of expression, intentions and viewpoints of artists and how they are viewed by audiences
Comment: The components of the content descriptions from the Present and Perform, Explore and Express Ideas, and Respond and Interpret strands in VC1 have been integrated into content descriptions in the Developing Practices, Creating and Exploring strands to align with the revised structure in VC2. Links to VCE Visual Arts, Media and Visual Communication Design study designs

ContentDescription_V1: Analyse, interpret and evaluate a range of visual artworks from different cultures, historical and contemporary contexts, including artworks by Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Peoples to explore differing viewpoints
Comment: The components of the content descriptions from the Present and Perform, Explore and Express Ideas, and Respond and Interpret strands in VC1 have been integrated into content descriptions in the Developing Practices, Creating and Exploring strands to align with the revised structure in VC2. Links to VCE Visual Arts, Media and Visual Communication Design study designs

ContentDescription_V1: Conceptualise, plan and design art works that express ideas, concepts and artistic intentions
Comment: Components of the content description from the Visual Arts Practices strand in VC1 has been integrated into this content description in the Creating strand in VC2. Provides the opportunity for students to understand how meaning is communicated and interpreted in artworks

ContentDescription_V1: Create, present, analyse and evaluate displays of artwork considering how ideas can be conveyed to an audience
Comment: Content description has been expanded to consider the curation and exhibition of artworks in different contexts linked to students exhibiting their own artworks
